tools.title: 16” MacBook Pro, M1 Max, 64GB RAM (2021)
tools.description: I was using an Intel-based 16” MacBook Pro prior to this and the difference is night and day. I’ve never heard the fans turn on a single time, even under the incredibly heavy loads I put it through with our various launch simulations.

tools.title: Apple Pro Display XDR (Standard Glass)
tools.description: The only display on the market if you want something HiDPI and bigger than 27”. When you’re working at planetary scale, every pixel you can get counts.

tools.title: IBM Model M SSK Industrial Keyboard
tools.description: They don’t make keyboards the way they used to. I buy these any time I see them go up for sale and keep them in storage in case I need parts or need to retire my main.

tools.title: Apple Magic Trackpad
tools.description: Something about all the gestures makes me feel like a wizard with special powers. I really like feeling like a wizard with special powers.

tools.title: Herman Miller Aeron Chair
tools.description: If I’m going to slouch in the worst ergonomic position imaginable all day, I might as well do it in an expensive chair.
